attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded this app i was taken to a picture of dwan johnson with explicit content. i then had to power off my phone and put it in the microwave before it went back to normal.
attributes.title: NO❤️

attributes.review: When I opened this app, I saw a discord tag so i copy link but I can’t copy stuff on this app, so this deserves a 1 star for not able to copy link oh and! If u don’t vote for trump, 2020 will go away and good luck 2021 will come
attributes.title: Why this app a thing

attributes.review:
I wish i could give this app 0 stars. I opened the app and it told me to enter my race. Instead of the “African or Black American” option, it had “porch monkey. I just reserved tickets to the up coming rally but due to these events... I WILL BE PASSING AWAY 😔😔😔. Don’t worry, I’m surely suing from my grave 😘

- XOXO GOSSIP GYAL 🥰😍🥰😘🥰🥰
attributes.title: APP CALLED ME A PORCH MONKEY 😡

attributes.review: 😖i clicked on to see some weird odd orange creature staring at me i was horrified i threw my phone and my phone exploded (im on my computer typing this at the moment) and my arms fell off so i have to get prosthetic arms so i can type this very review i suggest suing the owner of the app😿
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!

attributes.review: I got this app so it can tell me when the president will kill him self. I’m very furious because I’m not getting any updates on that 😡. I’m still waiting for my updates on why this dude hasn’t died yet

attributes.review: FAKE NEWS, nothing but lies in this app and the quality is awful!!! I thought our great leader would keep doing wonders for us but whoever made this obviously doesn’t know the same Troompa Loompa I know ! 😤 We need a wall around this app ASAP

attributes.review: This app is extremely inappropriate and I wouldn’t recommend getting this for you or your kids. It promotes values that I don’t believe in..my way or the highway 😽

attributes.review: The app itself is pointless, it took forever to download and then started to glitch immediately after I got it to start working. I would give it 0 stars if I could

attributes.review: I thought this app would help me connect with The Donald but instead i got a racist president. Send help this app made me very sad. Nothing works and they keep asking for money when he’s already very poor.
